jathika sawiya gama naguma sanwardhana wyapruthiya yatathe homagama mathiwarana kottasayata ayath gramiya pradeshayak wana kiriwaththuduwa pradeshaya sanwardhanaya kirimata piyawara gena atha.me yatathe pradeshaye marga pulul kara konkrit kirima, palam saha alaweli idikirima athulu yatithala pahasukam nanwalima sidukara thibe.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage sankalpayak matha aarambha karana lada jathika sawiya gama naguma saha maga naguma sanwardhana wyapruthi palath palana aayathanawala, mahajana niyojithayange ha ema wyapruthi sidu kirima sandaha pihitu wana lada jana sabhawala yojana anuwa sidu kere.me yatathe homagama udugahapaththu bala pradeshayata ayath kiriwanthuduwa, kahathuduwa ha polgasoowita pradesha niyojanaya karanu labana bandula ileperuma, pradeshiya sabha manthriwarayage saha kiriwanthuduwa jana sabhawala yojana anuwa rupiyal laksha panahaka mudalak waya kara marga dahayak pulul kara konkrit damima sidu kara atha.mita samagamiwa palam ha alaweli sadima saha palath sabha aramudala yatathe rupiyal laksha haththawaka mudalak waya kara kiriwanthuduwa pradeshayata nawa aadahanagarayak da idi kere.   .
